document.full_text: western and arab nations meet in abu dhabi on thursday to focus on what one u.s. official called the "end-game" for libya's muammar gaddafi as nato once again stepped up the intensity of its air raids on tripoli.
document.title: western, arab talks to focus on libya "end-game"
lines_and_colors: western and arab nations meet in abu dhabi on thursday to focus on what one u.s. official called the "end-game" for libya's muammar gaddafi as nato once again stepped up the intensity of its air raids on tripoli.
